previewArticle.title: US Open Cup: Seattle Sounders, LA Galaxy begin quest as 4th round wraps up | Matchday Preview

recapArticle.title: Seattle dominate PSA Elite, Chicago win weather-shortened game | US Open Cup Recaps

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Sporting Kansas City 2, Minnesota United FC 0.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Two late goals spell #USOC2014 victory for @SportingKC: http://t.co/I8gFrsCRct #SKCvMNU http://t.co/rjlob7KDvw

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Two late goals spell #USOC2014 victory for @SportingKC: http://t.co/I8gFrsCRct #SKCvMNU http://t.co/rjlob7KDvw

timelineItems.name: Minnesota United FC
timelineItems.text: Our photo gallery for #SKCvMNU from last night's #USOC2014 match is up! View it here: http://t.co/YVRg3xwatM http://t.co/0KF67JQRmZ

timelineItems.name: Minnesota United FC
timelineItems.text: Our photo gallery for #SKCvMNU from last night's #USOC2014 match is up! View it here: http://t.co/YVRg3xwatM http://t.co/0KF67JQRmZ

timelineItems.name: Minnesota United FC
timelineItems.text: Still up thinking about tonight's match? Watching the lightning storm? WATCH #SKCvMNU highlights instead: http://t.co/MOYJwyswCo

timelineItems.name: Minnesota United FC
timelineItems.text: .@andygreder traveled to KC for the @PioneerPress to report on the #SKCvMNU #USOC2014 match. READ the article here: http://t.co/tOhCFqeV8Y

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: Yellow card issued to @MNUnitedFC's Greg Jordan in the 29th minute #SKCvMNU #USOC2014 http://t.co/FtOnnAosk4

timelineItems.name: Minnesota United FC
timelineItems.text: 29' - YELLOW CARD - @gregjordan90 slides in late at midfield and receives the first yellow of the game for either team. #SKCvMNU

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: The #SportingKC debut for @vicomm10 will be short-lived as @AlexMartinez_15 comes on for an injured Munoz in the 36th minute #SKCvMNU

timelineItems.name: Minnesota United FC
timelineItems.text: #SKCvMNU is playing on the big screen at @britspubmpls! We are 40 minutes into the match and still scoreless. #MNUFC http://t.co/KghNq7hWPu

timelineItems.name: Minnesota United FC
timelineItems.text: #SKCvMNU is playing on the big screen at @britspubmpls! We are 40 minutes into the match and still scoreless. #MNUFC http://t.co/KghNq7hWPu

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, Sporting Kansas City 0, Minnesota United FC 0.

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: HALFTIME: A few chances between the teams and #SKCvMNU will enter the break 0-0. http://t.co/r8wk7DESP3 #USOC2014

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: WATCH: @soonysaad nearly beat Mitchell Hildebrandt with this curling attempt in the 7th minute #SKCvMNU http://t.co/7uioUcMbAL

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: You asked, we answered. #SportingKC has changed kits for the second half. Tune in --> http://t.co/FtOnnAosk4 #SKCvMNU #USOC2014

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins Sporting Kansas City 0, Minnesota United FC 0.

timelineItems.name: Minnesota United FC
timelineItems.text: Strange change at halftime - @SportingKC is now wearing different colored kits as the second half begins! #SKCvMNU #USOC2014

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: STRAIGHT RED! @MNUnitedFC will play with 10 men after Dias picks up a red card for a foul on Dwyer #SKCvMNU http://t.co/FtOnnAosk4

timelineItems.name: Minnesota United FC
timelineItems.text: WATCH the #USOC2014 #SKCvMNU live stream free at http://t.co/OEFaVl2apB. Winner continues toward the CONCACAF CL! http://t.co/DaZoNU7FD1

timelineItems.name: Minnesota United FC
timelineItems.text: WATCH the #USOC2014 #SKCvMNU live stream free at http://t.co/OEFaVl2apB. Winner continues toward the CONCACAF CL! http://t.co/DaZoNU7FD1

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: 62' #SportingKC SUB - @SalZizzo on for Claudio Bieler #SKCvMNU #USOC2014 http://t.co/r8wk7DESP3

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: Here we go, #SKCNation! #USOC2014 #SKCvMNU https://t.co/xRbYorH4PU

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: And it's GAME ON at @SportingPark! Watch #SKCvMNU LIVE via @YouTube --> http://t.co/FtOnnAosk4 #USOC2014

timelineItems.name: Minnesota United FC
timelineItems.text: 63' - #SKC SUB - Sal Zizzo IN Claudio Bieler OUT. #SKCvMNU #USOC2014

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: #SKCvMNU is definitely opening up. Hildrebrandt with 2 point-blank saves to keep the game scoreless. Watch: http://t.co/FtOnnAosk4 #USOC2014

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: 73' @MNUnitedFC SUB - Floyd Franks on for Daniel Mendes. 0-0 #SKCvMNU http://t.co/FtOnnAosk4

timelineItems.name: Minnesota United FC
timelineItems.text: 73' - #MNU SUB - Franks IN, Mendes OUT. #SKCvMNU #USOC2014

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: Tonight's attendance is 15,307. Unbelievable support by #SKCNation! #SKCvMNU #USOC2014 http://t.co/r8wk7DESP3

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: GOAL!!!! @SoonySaad puts #SportingKC ahead 1-0 in the 76th minute!!! #SKCvMNU http://t.co/FtOnnAosk4

timelineItems.name: Minnesota United FC
timelineItems.text: 80' #MNU SUB - Daley IN, Vicentini OUT. #SKCvMNU #USOC2014

timelineItems.name: Minnesota United FC
timelineItems.text: 82' - YELLOW CARD - #SKC's Dwyer wraps his arm around Calvano and brings him down. Receives a yellow card. #SKCvMNU

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: GOAL! Soony Saad puts @SportingKC up 1-0. About 10 minutes left to play: http://t.co/YUMfNEK15p #SKCvMNU http://t.co/0MW3vZiy8h

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: GOAL! Soony Saad puts @SportingKC up 1-0. About 10 minutes left to play: http://t.co/YUMfNEK15p #SKCvMNU http://t.co/0MW3vZiy8h

timelineItems.name: Minnesota United FC
timelineItems.text: 85' - #MNU SUB - Jamie Watson IN, Justin Davis OUT. #SKCvMNU #USOC2014

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: GOAL!!! @AlexMartinez_15 hammers it home from close range to put #SportingKC ahead 2-0 in the 87th minute! #SKCvMNU http://t.co/FtOnnAosk4

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: 88' SUB - @BigAfrika88 on for @SoonySaad with #SportingKC ahead 2-0 late. http://t.co/FtOnnAosk4 #SKCvMNU

timelineItems.name: Minnesota United FC
timelineItems.text: 89' - #SKC SUB - C.J. Sapong IN Soony Saad OUT. #SKCvMNU #USOC2014

timelineItems.name: Minnesota United FC
timelineItems.text: 90'+ - Five minutes of stoppage time yet to be played at Sporting Park. #SKCvMNU

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, Sporting Kansas City 2, Minnesota United FC 0.
